PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-03612012-03-29,  ,  ,  HC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Consumer Product Safety Act (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA CONSUMER PRODUCT SAFETY ACT (Miscellaneous Program) in order to respond to recommendations of the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations on the Corded Window Covering Products Regulations, the Glass Doors and Enclosures Regulations and the Toys Regulations to address minor inconsistencies between the English and French versions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0071 Publication Date: 2012-04-11
AttachmentsAttachment
